resources:
<<<<<<< HEAD
TimberSong A Small Guide to the Chants
Of the Timbers Army
About 2012 Schedule Times are PM PDT - Last updated: 03/24/12 2012 Home Away
HIGHWATER
LABS Mobile Application Development
Portland, OR
2012 Project Home:
 http://highwaterlabs.com/timbersong.html Source Code:
 https://github.com/eupharis/timbersong v1.1
"03/12 @ 7:30 | Philadelphia"
"03/31 @ 7:00 | Real Salt Lake"
"04/07 @ 7:30 | Chivas"
"04/21 @ 7:30 | Sporting KC"
"05/05 @ 7:30 | Columbus"
"05/20 @ 4:00 | Chicago"
"05/23 @ 7:30 | Valencia"
"05/26 @ 7:00 | Vancouver"
"06/24 @ 2:00 | Seattle"
"07/03 @ 7:30 | San Jose"
"07/14 @ 8:00 | Los Angeles"
"08/05 @ 4:00 | Dallas"
"08/25 @ 7:30 | Vancouver"
"08/31 @ 7:30 | Colorado"
"09/15 @12:30 | Seattle"
"09/29 @ 7:30 | D.C. United"
"10/27 @ 3:30 | San Jose"
"03/17 @ 6:00 | FC Dallas"
"03/24 @ 1:00 | New England"
"04/14 @ 7:30 | Los Angeles"
"04/28 @11:00AM | Montreal"
"05/15 @ 5:30 | Houston"
"06/17 @ 4:00 | Los Angeles"
"06/30 @ 6:00 | Colorado"
"07/07 @ 6:00 | Real Salt Lake"
"07/18 @ 1:00 | Chivas"
"07/21 @ 6:00 | Dallas"
"08/15 @ 4:30 | Toronto"
"08/19 @ 4:00 | New York"
"09/05 @ 6:00 | Colorado"
"09/19 @ 7:30 | San Jose"
"09/22 @ 5:00 | Real Salt Lake"
"10/07 @ 6:00 | Seattle"
"10/21 @ 4:00 | Vancouver"
Bury Me in Timbers Green Can't Help Falling in Love I Wanna Be Rose City Mental And Barmy Mental And Green Mighty PTFC North End Noise Onward Rose City Party In Portland Portland We Love You So Portland Boys We Are Here Rose City, Whoa-Oh Somos Timbers Tetris We're Gonna Win the League You Are My Sunshine
And when I go
 And when I go
 And when I go
 Make sure I’m wearing green and gold
 Bury me in Timbers Green, Ohh-ohh
 Bury me in Timbers Gold, Ahh-ahh
 Bury me in Timbers Green, Ohh-ohh
 Bury me in Timbers Gold, Ahh-ahh

(At the 85th minute)

 Wise men say
 Only fools rush in
 But I can\’t help
 Falling in love with you
 Take my hand
 Take my whole life too
 'Cause I can’t help
 Falling in love with you

We are Timbers Army
 We are mental and we’re barmy
 True supporters forever more

(Tune: “You are my Sunshine”)
 
 We are the Portland
 The Portland Timbers
 We are mental
 And we are green
 We are the greatest
 Football supporters
 That the world has ever seen.

Allez Allez Alo
 Allez Allez Alo
 We are the Rose City
 The mighty PTFC
 (2x slow with overhead claps, 2x fast)

(Follow capo to know which group you’re in)
 
 GROUP ONE: So who are we?
 GROUP TWO: So who are we?
 G1: We are the boys!
 G2: We are the boys!
 G1: We’re from the North End
 and we’re here to make some noise!
 G2: Make some noise!
 G1: For our boys!
 G2: For our boys!
 G1: And you will see!
 G2: And you will see!
 All: We’re gonna jump and clap and sing
 For victory!
 And when we do… you’ll know that noise
 Came from the North End
 Portland Timbers Army Boys
 Oh Rose City, oh Rose City
 This is our team, the mighty P-T-F-C!
Whoooooa, Whoooooa, Whoooooa
 Whoooooa, Whoooooa, Whoooooa
 Whoooooa, Whoooooa, Whoooooa
 On-ward Rose City
 (2x with hands up, 2x clapping)

We’ll sing for you Timbers
 ‘Til you finish the fight
 There’s a party in Portland
 No one’s sleeping tonight

Portland we love you so
 And where you go we will follow
 Portland we love you so
 You’ve stolen our hearts. TIM-BERS!
 
 (Alternate slow overhead claps and fast)
Portland boys, we are here
 Whoa, Whoa
 Portland boys, we are here
 Whoa, Whoa
 Portland boys, we are here
 Shag your women, drink your beer!
 Whoa, Whoa, Whoa
 
 Burn, destroy, wreck and kill
 Whoa, Whoa
 Burn, destroy, wreck and kill
 Whoa, Whoa
 Burn, destroy, wreck and kill
 Portland Timbers bloody will!
 Whoa, Whoa, Whoa
 
 Use your head, use your feet
 Whoa, Whoa
 Use your head, use your feet
 Whoa, Whoa
 Use your head, use your feet
 10 [color of opposition] buggers at my feet!
 Whoa, Whoa, Whoa
 
 We are green, we are white
 Whoa, Whoa
 We are green, we are white
 Whoa, Whoa
 We are green, we are white
 We are bloody dynamite!
 Whoa, Whoa, Whoa
 
 (Only sing when directed by capos:)
 Can you hear [the others] sing?
 Noo, Noo
 Can you hear [the others] sing?
 Noo, Noo
 Can you hear [the others] sing?
 I can’t hear a bloody thing!
 Whoa, Whoa, Whoa

Ole Ole Ole,
 Ole Ole Ola,
 Sooo
 Somos Timbers
 Portland Timbers
 Vamos a ganar!

(Tune: “Tetris theme (Korobeiniki)”)
 
 Portland Timbers
 We adore you
 Portland Timbers
 For you, WE SING!
 Lo lo-lo-lo lo-lo-lo…

Rose City, Whoa-oh
 Rose City, Whoa-oh
 Stand for the boys in green
 The best you’ve ever seen

(Tune: “Anarchy in the UK”)

 I am a Timbers fan!
 And I am an Oregonian!
 I know what I want and I know how to get it
 I wanna destroy
 Seattle scum
 Cuz I wanna be
 Rose City

We’re gonna win the league
 We’re gonna win the league
 I don’t know how
 I don’t know when
 But we’re gonna win the league!
(At the 80th minute)
 
 You are my sunshine
 My only sunshine
 You make me happy
 When skies are gray
 You’ll never know dear,
 How much I love you
 So please don’t take my sunshine away

http://m.youtube.com/watch?v=-2DqNaUKN0s
http://m.youtube.com/watch?v=jFm-TzIWzt4
http://m.youtube.com/watch?v=Alo6-VBYjI4

app.name: TimberSong
app.description: A Small Guide to the Chants Of the Timbers Army

chant.name: Bury Me in Timbers Green
chant.lyrics: And when I go And when I go And when I go Make sure I'm wearing green and gold Bury me in Timbers Green, Ohh-ohh Bury me in Timbers Gold, Ahh-ahh Bury me in Timbers Green, Ohh-ohh Bury me in Timbers Gold, Ahh-ahh

chant.name: Can't Help Falling in Love
chant.lyrics: (At the 85th minute) Wise men say Only fools rush in But I can't help Falling in love with you Take my hand Take my whole life too 'Cause I can't help Falling in love with you

chant.name: I Wanna Be Rose City
chant.lyrics: (Tune: "Anarchy in the UK") I am a Timbers fan! And I am an Oregonian! I know what I want and I know how to get it I wanna destroy Seattle scum Cuz I wanna be Rose City

chant.name: Mental and Barmy
chant.lyrics: We are Timbers Army We are mental and we're barmy True supporters forever more

chant.name: Mental and Green
chant.lyrics:
(Tune: "You are my Sunshine")
We are the Portland The Portland Timbers We are mental And we are green We are the greatest Football supporters That the world has ever seen.

chant.name: Mighty PTFC
chant.lyrics: Allez Allez Alo Allez Allez Alo We are the Rose City The mighty PTFC (2x slow with overhead claps, 2x fast)

chant.name: North End Noise
chant.lyrics:
(Follow capo to know which group you're in)
GROUP ONE: So who are we? GROUP TWO: So who are we? G1: We are the boys! G2: We are the boys! G1: We're from the North End and we're here to make some noise! G2: Make some noise! G1: For our boys! G2: For our boys! G1: And you will see! G2: And you will see! All: We're gonna jump and clap and sing For victory! And when we do… you'll know that noise Came from the North End Portland Timbers Army Boys Oh Rose City, oh Rose City This is our team, the mighty P-T-F-C!

chant.name: Onward Rose City
chant.lyrics: Whoooooa, Whoooooa, Whoooooa Whoooooa, Whoooooa, Whoooooa Whoooooa, Whoooooa, Whoooooa On-ward Rose City (2x with hands up, 2x clapping)

chant.name: Party in Portland
chant.lyrics: We'll sing for you Timbers ‘Til you finish the fight There's a party in Portland No one's sleeping tonight

chant.name: Portland We Love You So
chant.lyrics:
Portland we love you so And where you go we will follow Portland we love you so You've stolen our hearts. TIM-BERS!
(Alternate slow overhead claps and fast)

chant.name: Portland Boys We Are Here
chant.lyrics:
Portland boys, we are here Whoa, Whoa Portland boys, we are here Whoa, Whoa Portland boys, we are here Shag your women, drink your beer! Whoa, Whoa, Whoa
Burn, destroy, wreck and kill Whoa, Whoa Burn, destroy, wreck and kill Whoa, Whoa Burn, destroy, wreck and kill Portland Timbers bloody will! Whoa, Whoa, Whoa
Use your head, use your feet Whoa, Whoa Use your head, use your feet Whoa, Whoa Use your head, use your feet 10 [color of opposition] buggers at my feet! Whoa, Whoa, Whoa
We are green, we are white Whoa, Whoa We are green, we are white Whoa, Whoa We are green, we are white We are bloody dynamite! Whoa, Whoa, Whoa
(Only sing when directed by capos:) Can you hear [the others] sing? Noo, Noo Can you hear [the others] sing? Noo, Noo Can you hear [the others] sing? I can't hear a bloody thing! Whoa, Whoa, Whoa

chant.name: Rose City, Whoa-Oh
chant.lyrics: Rose City, Whoa-oh Rose City, Whoa-oh Stand for the boys in green The best you've ever seen

chant.name: Somos Timbers
chant.lyrics: Ole Ole Ole, Ole Ole Ola, Sooo Somos Timbers Portland Timbers Vamos a ganar!

chant.name: Tetris
chant.lyrics:
(Tune: "Tetris theme (Korobeiniki)")
Portland Timbers We adore you Portland Timbers For you, WE SING! Lo lo-lo-lo lo-lo-lo...

chant.name: We're Gonna Win the League
chant.lyrics: We're gonna win the league We're gonna win the league I don't know how I don't know when But we're gonna win the league!

chant.name: You Are My Sunshine
chant.lyrics:
(At the 80th minute)
You are my sunshine My only sunshine You make me happy When skies are gray You'll never know dear, How much I love you So please don't take my sunshine away
